Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, To ensure that we are meeting or exceeding your expectations for the products your dealership has purchased from VinSoltuions, we would like you to complete a survey about the level of service our Implementation Team is providing you during the process of making your products ready to use.

Thank you in advance for your time,
Your VinCare Team
